Black Fortress/Alecto:

Black Fortress's door closed and soon the cave where the base was 
sunk in lava. The cave was filled of lave. Inside the base all was 
normal as if any thing wrong happened there.

"Follow me" said Alecto "Soon you will see Drill bit"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Destructor followed closely. he heard her warning and ran even 
faster. He 
> crossed the brisge and waited to see where he was suppose to go 
next.
